schemas.name: HCLS - 2015 with Requirement Levels
schemas.description: HCLS schema generated on 25/03/2015 using HCLS-scraper
schemas.data:
PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dctypes: <http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX freq: <http://purl.org/cld/freq/>
PREFIX idot: <http://identifiers.org/idot/>
PREFIX lexvo: <http://lexvo.org/id/iso639-3/>
PREFIX pav: <http://purl.org/pav/>
PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schemaorg: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX sd: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sparql-service-description#>
PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX void-ext: <http://ldf.fi/void-ext#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

<SummaryLevelShape> {


  #Core Metadata

    #Type declaration
    `MUST` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),

    #Type declaration
    `MUST NOT` !rdf:type (void:Dataset dcat:Distribution),

    #Title
    `MUST` dct:title rdf:langString,

    #Alternative titles
    `MAY` dct:alternative rdf:langString,

    #Description
    `MUST` dct:description rdf:langString,

    #Date created
    `MUST NOT` !dct:created .,

    #Other dates
    `MUST NOT` !pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Other dates
    `MUST NOT` !pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Other dates
    `MUST NOT` !pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Creators
    `MUST NOT` !dct:creator IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MUST NOT` !dct:contributor IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MUST NOT` !pav:createdBy IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MUST NOT` !pav:authoredBy IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MUST NOT` !pav:curatedBy IRI,

    #Publisher
    `MUST` dct:publisher IRI,

    #Date of issue
    `MUST NOT` !dct:issued .,

    #HTML page
    `SHOULD` foaf:page IRI,

    #Logo
    `SHOULD` schemaorg:logo IRI,

    #Keywords
    `MAY` dcat:keyword xsd:string+,

    #License
    `MAY` dct:license IRI+,

    #Rights
    `MAY` dct:rights rdf:langString,

    #Language
    `MUST NOT` !dct:language .,

    #References
    `MAY` dct:references IRI+,

    #Concept descriptors
    `MAY` dcat:theme IRI+,

    #Vocabulary used
    `MUST NOT` !void:vocabulary IRI,

    #Standards used
    `MUST NOT` !dct:conformsTo IRI+,

    #Citations
    `MAY` cito:citesAsAuthority IRI+,

    #Related material
    `MAY` rdfs:seeAlso IRI,

    #Partitions
    `MAY` dct:hasPart IRI+,


  #Identifiers

    #Preferred prefix
    `MAY` idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string,

    #Alternate prefix
    `MAY` idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string,

    #Identifier pattern
    `MUST NOT` !idot:identifierPattern xsd:string,

    #URI pattern
    `MUST NOT` !void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string,

    #File access pattern
    `MUST NOT` !idot:accessPattern .+,

    #Example identifier
    `MUST NOT` !idot:exampleIdentifier xsd:string,

    #Example resource
    `MUST NOT` !void:exampleResource IRI,


  #Provenance and Change

    #Version identifier
    `MUST NOT` !pav:version xsd:string,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !dct:isVersionOf IRI,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !pav:previousVersion IRI,

    #Version linking
    `MAY` pav:hasCurrentVersion IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `MUST NOT` !dct:source IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `MUST NOT` !pav:retrievedFrom IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `MUST NOT` !prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI,

    #Item listing
    `MUST NOT` !sio:has-data-item IRI,

    #Creation tool
    `MUST NOT` !pav:createdWith IRI,

    #Update frequency
    `SHOULD` dct:accrualPeriodicity IRI,


  #Availability/Distributions

    #Distribution description
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:distribution IRI+,

    #File format
    `MUST NOT` !dct:format .,

    #File directory
    `MAY` dcat:accessURL IRI,

    #File URL
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:downloadURL IRI,

    #Byte size
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:byteSize xsd:decimal,

    #RDF File URL
    `MUST NOT` !void:dataDump IRI,

    #SPARQL endpoint
    `SHOULD` void:sparqlEndpoint IRI,

    #Documentation
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:landingPage IRI,

    #Linkset
    `MUST NOT` !void:subset IRI,


  #Statistics

    ## of triples
    `MUST NOT` !void:triples xsd:integer,

    ## of typed entities
    `MUST NOT` !void:entities xsd:integer,

    ## of subjects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctSubjects xsd:integer,

    ## of properties
    `MUST NOT` !void:properties xsd:integer,

    ## of objects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctObjects xsd:integer,

    ## of classes
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition IRI,

    ## of literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition IRI,

    ## of RDF graphs
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition IRI,

    #class frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition IRI,

    #property frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and subject types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property subject and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI
}

<VersionLevelShape> {


  #Core Metadata

    #Type declaration
    `MUST` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),

    #Type declaration
    `MUST NOT` !rdf:type (void:Dataset dcat:Distribution),

    #Title
    `MUST` dct:title rdf:langString,

    #Alternative titles
    `MAY` dct:alternative rdf:langString,

    #Description
    `MUST` dct:description rdf:langString,

    #Date created
    `SHOULD` dct:created .,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Creators
    `MUST` dct:creator IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` dct:contributor IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:createdBy IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:curatedBy IRI,

    #Publisher
    `MUST` dct:publisher IRI,

    #Date of issue
    `SHOULD` dct:issued .,

    #HTML page
    `SHOULD` foaf:page IRI,

    #Logo
    `SHOULD` schemaorg:logo IRI,

    #Keywords
    `MAY` dcat:keyword xsd:string+,

    #License
    `SHOULD` dct:license IRI+,

    #Rights
    `MAY` dct:rights rdf:langString,

    #Language
    `SHOULD` dct:language .,

    #References
    `MAY` dct:references IRI+,

    #Concept descriptors
    `MAY` dcat:theme IRI+,

    #Vocabulary used
    `MUST NOT` !void:vocabulary IRI,

    #Standards used
    `MAY` dct:conformsTo IRI+,

    #Citations
    `MAY` cito:citesAsAuthority IRI+,

    #Related material
    `MAY` rdfs:seeAlso IRI,

    #Partitions
    `MAY` dct:hasPart IRI+,


  #Identifiers

    #Preferred prefix
    `MAY` idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string,

    #Alternate prefix
    `MAY` idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string,

    #Identifier pattern
    `MUST NOT` !idot:identifierPattern xsd:string,

    #URI pattern
    `MUST NOT` !void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string,

    #File access pattern
    `MUST NOT` !idot:accessPattern .+,

    #Example identifier
    `MUST NOT` !idot:exampleIdentifier xsd:string,

    #Example resource
    `MUST NOT` !void:exampleResource IRI,


  #Provenance and Change

    #Version identifier
    `MUST` pav:version xsd:string,

    #Version linking
    `MUST` dct:isVersionOf IRI,

    #Version linking
    `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !pav:hasCurrentVersion IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` dct:source IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` pav:retrievedFrom IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI,

    #Item listing
    `MUST NOT` !sio:has-data-item IRI,

    #Creation tool
    `SHOULD` pav:createdWith IRI,

    #Update frequency
    `MUST NOT` !dct:accrualPeriodicity IRI,


  #Availability/Distributions

    #Distribution description
    `SHOULD` dcat:distribution IRI+,

    #File format
    `MUST NOT` !dct:format .,

    #File directory
    `MAY` dcat:accessURL IRI,

    #File URL
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:downloadURL IRI,

    #Byte size
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:byteSize xsd:decimal,

    #RDF File URL
    `MUST NOT` !void:dataDump IRI,

    #SPARQL endpoint
    `SHOULD NOT` !void:sparqlEndpoint IRI,

    #Documentation
    `MAY` dcat:landingPage IRI,

    #Linkset
    `MUST NOT` !void:subset IRI,


  #Statistics

    ## of triples
    `MUST NOT` !void:triples xsd:integer,

    ## of typed entities
    `MUST NOT` !void:entities xsd:integer,

    ## of subjects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctSubjects xsd:integer,

    ## of properties
    `MUST NOT` !void:properties xsd:integer,

    ## of objects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctObjects xsd:integer,

    ## of classes
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition IRI,

    ## of literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition IRI,

    ## of RDF graphs
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition IRI,

    #class frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition IRI,

    #property frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and subject types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property subject and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition IRI
}

<DistributionLevelShape> {


  #Core Metadata

    #Type declaration
    `SHOULD` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),

    #Type declaration
    `MUST` rdf:type (void:Dataset dcat:Distribution),

    #Title
    `MUST` dct:title rdf:langString,

    #Alternative titles
    `MAY` dct:alternative rdf:langString,

    #Description
    `MUST` dct:description rdf:langString,

    #Date created
    `SHOULD` dct:created .,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth,

    #Creators
    `MUST` dct:creator IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` dct:contributor IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:createdBy IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:curatedBy IRI,

    #Publisher
    `MUST` dct:publisher IRI,

    #Date of issue
    `SHOULD` dct:issued .,

    #HTML page
    `SHOULD` foaf:page IRI,

    #Logo
    `SHOULD` schemaorg:logo IRI,

    #Keywords
    `MAY` dcat:keyword xsd:string+,

    #License
    `MUST` dct:license IRI+,

    #Rights
    `MAY` dct:rights rdf:langString,

    #Language
    `SHOULD` dct:language .,

    #References
    `MAY` dct:references IRI+,

    #Concept descriptors
    `MAY` dcat:theme IRI+,

    #Vocabulary used
    `SHOULD` void:vocabulary IRI,

    #Standards used
    `SHOULD` dct:conformsTo IRI+,

    #Citations
    `MAY` cito:citesAsAuthority IRI+,

    #Related material
    `MAY` rdfs:seeAlso IRI,

    #Partitions
    `MUST NOT` !dct:hasPart IRI+,


  #Identifiers

    #Preferred prefix
    `MAY` idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string,

    #Alternate prefix
    `MAY` idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string,

    #Identifier pattern
    `MAY` idot:identifierPattern xsd:string,

    #URI pattern
    `MAY` void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string,

    #File access pattern
    `MAY` idot:accessPattern .+,

    #Example identifier
    `SHOULD` idot:exampleIdentifier xsd:string,

    #Example resource
    `SHOULD` void:exampleResource IRI,


  #Provenance and Change

    #Version identifier
    `SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !dct:isVersionOf IRI,

    #Version linking
    `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !pav:hasCurrentVersion IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` dct:source IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` pav:retrievedFrom IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI,

    #Item listing
    `MAY` sio:has-data-item IRI,

    #Creation tool
    `SHOULD` pav:createdWith IRI,

    #Update frequency
    `MUST NOT` !dct:accrualPeriodicity IRI,


  #Availability/Distributions

    #Distribution description
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:distribution IRI+,

    #File format
    `MUST` dct:format .,

    #File directory
    `MAY` dcat:accessURL IRI,

    #File URL
    `SHOULD` dcat:downloadURL IRI,

    #Byte size
    `SHOULD` dcat:byteSize xsd:decimal,

    #RDF File URL
    `SHOULD` void:dataDump IRI,

    #SPARQL endpoint
    `SHOULD NOT` !void:sparqlEndpoint IRI,

    #Documentation
    `MAY` dcat:landingPage IRI,

    #Linkset
    `SHOULD` void:subset IRI,


  #Statistics

    ## of triples
    `SHOULD` void:triples xsd:integer,

    ## of typed entities
    `SHOULD` void:entities xsd:integer,

    ## of subjects
    `SHOULD` void:distinctSubjects xsd:integer,

    ## of properties
    `SHOULD` void:properties xsd:integer,

    ## of objects
    `SHOULD` void:distinctObjects xsd:integer,

    ## of classes
    `SHOULD` void:classPartition IRI,

    ## of literals
    `SHOULD` void:classPartition IRI,

    ## of RDF graphs
    `SHOULD` void:classPartition IRI,

    #class frequency
    `MAY` void:classPartition IRI,

    #property frequency
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and subject types
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and object types
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property and literals
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI,

    #property subject and object types
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI
}

dataDemos.name: ChEMBL 2015 Demo

schemas.name: HCLS - 2015 Version
schemas.data:
PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dctypes: <http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX freq: <http://purl.org/cld/freq/>
PREFIX idot: <http://identifiers.org/idot/>
PREFIX lexvo: <http://lexvo.org/id/iso639-3/>
PREFIX pav: <http://purl.org/pav/>
PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schemaorg: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX sd: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sparql-service-description#>
PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX void-ext: <http://ldf.fi/void-ext#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

<SummaryLevelShape> {
#Core
    rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),
    !rdf:type (void:Dataset),
    !rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),
    dct:title rdf:langString,
    ###dct:alternative rdf:langString, is a MAY property
    dct:description rdf:langString,
    !dct:creator .,
    !pav:createBy .,
    !dct:contributor .,
    !pav:authoredBy .,
    !pav:curatedBy .,
    !dct:created .,
    !pav:createdOn .,
    !pav:authoredOn .,
    !pav:curatedOn .,
    dct:publisher IRI,
    !dct:issued .,
    (foaf:page IRI)?,
    (schemaorg:logo IRI)?,
    (dct:license IRI)* , ### License is now a MAY property
    ###dct:rights rdf:langString, ### Rights is a MAY property
    !dct:language .,
    ###dcat:theme IRI*, ### Theme is a MAY property, should match something that is a skos:Concept
    ###dcat:keyword xsd:string, ### Keyword is a MAY property
    !void:vocabulary .,
    !dct:conformsTo .,
    ###dct:references IRI, ###MAY property
    ###cito:citesAsAuthority IRI, ### citation is a MAY property
    ###rdfs:seeAlso IRI, ###MAY property
    ###dct:hasPart IRI, ###part is a MAY property, what should be the shape of the description it matches?
    !void:subset .,
#Identifiers
    ###idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string, ### Preferred prefix is a MAY property
    ###idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string, ### Alternate prefix is a MAY property
    !idot:identifierPattern .,
    !void:uriRegexPattern .,
    !idot:accessPattern ., ### Access pattern is a MAY property
    !idot:exampleIdentifier .,
    !void:exampleResource .,
#Provenance and Change
    !void:inDataset .,
    !sio:has-data-item .,
    !pav:version .,
    !dct:isVersionOf .,
    !pav:previousVersion .,
    ###pav:hasCurrentVersion IRI, ###  is a MAY property, should this match an @VersionShape?
    !dct:source .,
    !pav:retrievedFrom .,
    !prov:wasDerivedFrom .,
    !pav:createdWith .,
    dct:accrualPeriodicity IRI?,###freq:~?, ###TODO Check freq:~ is the correct syntax
#Availability/Distributions
    !dcat:distribution .,
    !dcat:landingPage .,
    !dct:format .,
    ###dcat:accessURL IRI, ### is a MAY property
    !dcat:downloadURL .,
    !void:dataDump .,
    void:sparqlEndpoint IRI?,
#Statistics
    !void:triples .,
    !void:entities .,
    !void:distinctSubjects .,
    !void:properties .,
    !void:distinctObjects .,
    !void:classPartition .,
    !void:propertyPartition .,
    !void:subset .
}

<VersionLevelShape> {
#Core
    rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),
    !rdf:type (void:Dataset),
    !rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),
    dct:title rdf:langString,
    ###dct:alternative rdf:langString, is a MAY property
    dct:description rdf:langString,
    (dct:creator IRI, pav:createdBy IRI)+,
    ###(dct:contributor IRI)*, ###MAY property
    ###(pav:authoredBy IRI)*, ###MAY property
    ###(pav:curatedBy IRI)*, ###MAY property
    ###TODO add test that one of created or issued is present
    (dct:created xsd:date | dct:created  xsd:dateTime | dct:created xsd:gYearMonth | dct:created xsd:gYear | pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime)?,
    ###(pav:createdOn xsd:date | pav:createdOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:createdOn xsd:gYear), ###MAY property
    ###(pav:authoredOn xsd:date | pav:authoredOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYear), ###MAY property
    ###(pav:curatedOn xsd:date | pav:curatedOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYear), ###MAY property
    dct:publisher IRI,
    (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear)?,
    (foaf:page IRI)?,
    (schemaorg:logo IRI)?,
    (dct:license IRI)+ , ### License is SHOULD property, but multiple allowed
    ###dct:rights rdf:langString, ### Rights is a MAY property
    (dct:language .)*, ###TODO define the object
    ###dcat:theme IRI*, ### Theme is a MAY property, should match something that is a skos:Concept
    ###dcat:keyword xsd:string, ### Keyword is a MAY property
    !void:vocabulary .,
    ###dct:conformsTo IRI, ###MAY property
    ###dct:references IRI, ###MAY property
    ###cito:citesAsAuthority IRI, ### citation is a MAY property
    ###rdfs:seeAlso IRI, ###MAY property
    ###dct:hasPart IRI, ###part is a MAY property, what should be the shape of the description it matches?
    !void:subset .,
#Identifiers
    ###idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string, ### Preferred prefix is a MAY property
    ###idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string, ### Alternate prefix is a MAY property
    !idot:identifierPattern .,
    !void:uriRegexPattern .,
    !idot:accessPattern .,
    !idot:exampleIdentifier .,
    !void:exampleResource .,
#Provenance and Change
    !sio:has-data-item .,
    !void:inDataset .,
    pav:version xsd:string,
    dct:isVersionOf IRI,
    (pav:previousVersion IRI)?,
    !pav:hasCurrentVersion .,
    (dct:source IRI)*,
    (pav:retrievedFrom IRI)?,
    (prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI)*,
    pav:createdWith IRI?,
    !dct:accrualPeriodicity . ,
#Availability/Distributions
    (dcat:distribution IRI)*, ###TODO restrict the shape of the IRI but could be hard to test in practice
    ###dcat:landingPage IRI, ###MAY property
    !dct:format .,
    ###dcat:accessURL IRI, ### is a MAY property
    !dcat:downloadURL .,
    !void:dataDump .,
    !void:sparqlEndpoint ., ###SHOULD NOT being strict here
#Statistics
    !void:triples .,
    !void:entities .,
    !void:distinctSubjects .,
    !void:properties .,
    !void:distinctObjects .,
    !void:classPartition .,
    !void:propertyPartition .,
    !void:subset .
}

<DistributionLevelShape> {
#Core
    (rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset))?,
    ###RDF datasets are being validated separately
    !rdf:type (void:Dataset),
    rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),
    dct:title rdf:langString,
    ###dct:alternative rdf:langString, is a MAY property
    dct:description rdf:langString,
    (dct:creator IRI, pav:createdBy IRI)+,
    ###(dct:contributor IRI)*,
    ###(pav:authoredBy IRI)*,
    ###(pav:curatedBy IRI)*, MAY property
    ###TODO add test that one of created or issued is present
    (dct:created xsd:date | dct:created  xsd:dateTime | dct:created xsd:gYearMonth | dct:created xsd:gYear | pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime)?,
    ###pav:createdOn xsd:date | pav:createdOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:createdOn xsd:gYear, ###MAY property
    ###pav:authoredOn xsd:date | pav:authoredOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYear, ###MAY property
    ###pav:curatedOn xsd:date | pav:curatedOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYear, ###MAY property
    dct:publisher IRI,
    (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear)?,
    (foaf:page IRI)?,
    (schemaorg:logo IRI)?,
    (dct:license IRI)+ , ### License is MUST property, but multiple allowed
    ###dct:rights rdf:langString, ### Rights is a MAY property
    (dct:language .)*, ###TODO define the object
    ###dcat:theme IRI*, ### Theme is a MAY property, should match something that is a skos:Concept
    ###dcat:keyword xsd:string*, ### Keyword is a MAY property
    !void:vocabulary .,
    (dct:conformsTo IRI)?,
    ###dct:references IRI, ###MAY property
    ###cito:citesAsAuthority IRI, ### citation is a MAY property
    ###rdfs:seeAlso IRI, ###MAY property
    !dct:hasPart .,
    !void:subset ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
#Identifiers
    ###idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string, ### Preferred prefix is a MAY property
    ###idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string, ### Alternate prefix is a MAY property
    ###idot:identifierPattern xsd:string, ###MAY property
    !void:uriRegexPattern ., ### Not for an non-RDF dataset
    ###idot:accessPattern idot:AccessPattern, ### Access pattern is a MAY property
    (idot:exampleIdentifier xsd:string)*,
    !void:exampleResource ., ### Not for an non-RDF dataset
#Provenance and Change
    !sio:has-data-item ., ###Only for RDF dataset
    !void:inDataset ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    (pav:version xsd:string)?,
    !dct:isVersionOf .,
    (pav:previousVersion IRI)?,
    !pav:hasCurrentVersion .,
    (dct:source IRI)*,
    (pav:retrievedFrom IRI)?,
    (prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI)*,
    (pav:createdWith IRI)*,
    !dct:accrualPeriodicity . ,
#Availability/Distributions
    !dcat:distribution .,
    ###dcat:landingPage IRI,###MAY property
    (dct:format IRI | dct:format xsd:string),
    ###dcat:accessURL IRI, ### is a MAY property
    (dcat:downloadURL IRI)?,
    !void:dataDump .,  ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    !void:sparqlEndpoint ., #Applying strict semantics here
#Statistics
    !void:triples .,  ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    !void:entities ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    !void:distinctSubjects ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    !void:properties ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    !void:distinctObjects ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    !void:classPartition ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    !void:propertyPartition ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
    !void:subset . ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
}

<RDFDistributionLevelShape> {
#Core
    (rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset))?,
    rdf:type (void:Dataset),
    rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),
    dct:title rdf:langString,
    ###dct:alternative rdf:langString, is a MAY property
    dct:description rdf:langString,
    (dct:creator IRI | pav:createdBy IRI)+,
    ###(dct:contributor IRI)*,
    ###(pav:authoredBy IRI)*,
    ###(pav:curatedBy IRI)*, MAY property
    ###TODO add test that one of created or issued is present
    (dct:created xsd:date | dct:created  xsd:dateTime | dct:created xsd:gYearMonth | dct:created xsd:gYear | pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime)?,
    ###pav:createdOn xsd:date | pav:createdOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:createdOn xsd:gYear, ###MAY property
    ###pav:authoredOn xsd:date | pav:authoredOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYear, ###MAY property
    ###pav:curatedOn xsd:date | pav:curatedOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYear, ###MAY property
    dct:publisher IRI,
    (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear)?,
    (foaf:page IRI)?,
    (schemaorg:logo IRI)?,
    (dct:license IRI)+ , ### License is MUST property, but multiple allowed
    ###dct:rights rdf:langString, ### Rights is a MAY property
    (dct:language .)*, ###TODO define the object
    ###dcat:theme IRI*, ### Theme is a MAY property, should match something that is a skos:Concept
    ###dcat:keyword xsd:string*, ### Keyword is a MAY property
    void:vocabulary IRI*,
    (dct:conformsTo IRI)?,
    ###dct:references IRI, ###MAY property
    ###cito:citesAsAuthority IRI, ### citation is a MAY property
    ###rdfs:seeAlso IRI, ###MAY property
    !dct:hasPart .,
    !void:subset ., ### Not for a non-RDF dataset
#Identifiers
    ###idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string, ### Preferred prefix is a MAY property
    ###idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string, ### Alternate prefix is a MAY property
    ###idot:identifierPattern xsd:string, ###MAY property
    ###void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string, ### May property
    ###idot:accessPattern idot:AccessPattern, ### Access pattern is a MAY property
    (idot:exampleIdentifier xsd:string)*,
    (void:exampleResource IRI)*,
#Provenance and Change
    ###(sio:has-data-item IRI)*, ###MAY property
    (pav:version xsd:string)?,
    !dct:isVersionOf .,
    (pav:previousVersion IRI)?,
    !pav:hasCurrentVersion .,
    (dct:source IRI)*,
    (pav:retrievedFrom IRI)?,
    (prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI)*,
    (pav:createdWith IRI)?,
    !dct:accrualPeriodicity . ,
#Availability/Distributions
    !dcat:distribution .,
    ###dcat:landingPage IRI,###MAY property
    (dct:format IRI | dct:format xsd:string), ###Could limit the string to an RDF format
    ###dcat:accessURL IRI, ### is a MAY property
    (dcat:downloadURL IRI)?,
    (void:dataDump IRI)?,
    !void:sparqlEndpoint ., #Applying strict semantics here
#Statistics
    (void:triples xsd:integer)?,
    (void:entities xsd:integer)?,
    (void:distinctSubjects xsd:integer)?,
    (void:properties xsd:integer)?,
    (void:distinctObjects xsd:integer)?,
    ### Number of classes
    (void:classPartition @<NumberOfClassesShape>)?,
    ### Number of graphs
    (void:classPartition @<NumberofGraphsShape>)?
#Enhanced Statistics
    ###Not validating these!!!
    ###MAY properties
}

<NumberOfClassesShape> {
    void:class rdfs:Class ,
    void:distinctSubjects xsd:integer
}

<NumberOfGraphsShape> {
    void:class sd:Graph ,
    void:distinctSubjects xsd:integer
}

dataDemos.name: 2015 ChEMBL demo

schemas.name: OpenPHACTS 2013
schemas.description: Dataset Descriptions for the Open Pharmacological Space
schemas.data:
PREFIX bdb: <http://vocabularies.bridgedb.org/ops#>
PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dctypes: <http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/>
PREFIX eco: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX freq: <http://purl.org/cld/freq/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX pav: <http://purl.org/pav/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX freq: <http://purl.org/cld/freq/triennial>

<RDFDatasetDescription> {
	`MUST` rdf:type (void:Dataset dctypes:Dataset)+, ### maybe this needs to be void:Dataset?

	`MUST` dcterms:title rdf:langString,

	`MUST` dcterms:description rdf:langString,

	`MUST` dcterms:publisher IRI,

	`MUST` dcat:landingPage IRI,

	`MUST` dcterms:license IRI,

	`MUST` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,

	###TODO:
	###Link to the data download
	###For non-RDF data use dcat:distribution to link to a dataset distribution description;
	`MAY` dcat:Distribution IRI,

	###For RDF data use void:dataDump to point to the RDF or compressed RDF file(s).

	`SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,

	`SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,

	`SHOULD` dcterms:accrualPeriodicity .,#(freq:triennial freq:biennial freq:annual freq:semiannual freq:threeTimesAYear freq:quaterly freq:bimonthly freq:monthly freq:semimonthly freq:biweekly freq:threeTimesAMonth freq:weekly freq:semiweekly freq:threeTimesAWeek freq:daily freq:continous freq:irregular),

	###TODO:
	###Provide links to the data sources used to create the data
	###For RDF conversions of existing datasets
	###must
	###Link to the dataset description of the version of the file imported using pav:importedFrom.
	###should
	###Declare who imported the dataset using pav:importedBy with a URI for the individual;
	###Declare when the initial import was made using pav:importedOn and an xsd:dateTime;
	###Declare when the import has been refreshed using pav:lastRefreshedOn and an xsd:dateTime;
	###Declare the specific version of the tool or script used to conduct the import using pav:createdWith pointing to the URI representing the script.
	###For specifying sources from which this dataset is derived a link to the dataset description of the version of the file imported using pav:derivedFrom.

	`SHOULD` void:subset @<RDFDatasetDescription>+, # is this real life?

	`SHOULD` void:exampleResource IRI,

	`MAY` void:sparqlEdnpoint IRI,

	`MAY` void:uriSpace xsd:string,

	`MAY` void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string,

	`MAY` void:vocabulary IRI+,

	`MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI,

	`MAY` pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime,

	`MAY` pav:createdBy IRI,

	`MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime,

	`MAY` dcat:theme IRI,

	`MAY` cito:citeAsAuthority IRI,

	`MAY` foaf:page IRI+,

	`MAY` pav:contributedBy IRI
}


<DatasetDescription> {
	`MUST` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset), ### maybe this needs to be void:Dataset?

	`MUST` dcterms:title xsd:string,

	`MUST` dcterms:description xsd:string,

	`MUST` dcterms:publisher IRI,

	`MUST` dcat:landingPage IRI,

	`MUST` dcterms:license IRI,

	`MUST` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,

	###TODO:
	###Link to the data download
	###For non-RDF data use dcat:distribution to link to a dataset distribution description;
	###For RDF data use void:dataDump to point to the RDF or compressed RDF file(s).

	`SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,

	`SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,

	`SHOULD` dcterms:accuralPeriodicity (freq:triennial freq:biennial freq:annual freq:semiannual freq:threeTimesAYear freq:quaterly freq:bimonthly freq:monthly freq:semimonthly freq:biweekly freq:threeTimesAMonth freq:weekly freq:semiweekly freq:threeTimesAWeek freq:daily freq:continous freq:irregular),

	###TODO:
	###Provide links to the data sources used to create the data
	###For RDF conversions of existing datasets
	###must
	###Link to the dataset description of the version of the file imported using pav:importedFrom.
	###should
	###Declare who imported the dataset using pav:importedBy with a URI for the individual;
	###Declare when the initial import was made using pav:importedOn and an xsd:dateTime;
	###Declare when the import has been refreshed using pav:lastRefreshedOn and an xsd:dateTime;
	###Declare the specific version of the tool or script used to conduct the import using pav:createdWith pointing to the URI representing the script.
	###For specifying sources from which this dataset is derived a link to the dataset description of the version of the file imported using pav:derivedFrom.

	`SHOULD` void:subset @<DatasetDescription>+, # is this real life?

	`SHOULD` void:exampleResource IRI,

	`MAY` void:sparqlEdnpoint IRI,

	`MAY` void:uriSpace xsd:string,

	`MAY` void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string,

	`MAY` void:vocabulary IRI+,

	`MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI,

	`MAY` pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime,

	`MAY` pav:createdBy IRI,

	`MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime,

	`MAY` dcat:theme IRI,

	`MAY` cito:citeAsAuthority IRI,

	`MAY` foaf:page IRI+
}

<DatasetDistribution> {
	`MUST` rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),

	#TODO
	#`MUST` dcat:mediaType ,

	`MUST` dcat:downloadURL IRI,

	`SHOULD` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,

	`SHOULD` dcat:byteSize xsd:integer,

	`SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,

	`SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI
}

<LinksetDescription> {
	`MUST` rdf:type void:Linkset,

	`MUST` dcterms:title xsd:string,

	`MUST` dcterms:description xsd:string,

	`MUST` dcterms:publisher IRI,

	`MUST` dcterms:license IRI,

	`MUST` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,

	###TODO - it says file(s), i guess the S means there could be more than 1?
	`MUST` void:dataDump IRI+,

	###TODO - halp
	###Link to a description of the dataset that is the subject of the links using void:subjectsTarget.
	###Declare the type of concept being linked in the subject dataset using bdb:subjectsDatatype and a type drawn from Appendix B.1.
	###Link to a description of the dataset that is the object of the links using void:objectsTarget.
	###Declare the type of concept being linked in the object dataset using bdb:objectsDatatype and a type drawn from Appendix B.1.

	`MUST` void:linkPredicate IRI,

	###TODO
	###Declare the notion of equivalence using bdb:linksetJustification with one of the reasons given in Appendix B.2.
	###Declare whether the links have been computer generated or manually verified using bdb:assertionMethod with one of the assertion levels given in Appendix B.4.

	### TODO
	###Declare if the linkset is a subset of a dataset void:subset (Note that the linkset resource is the object of this triple).
	###Declare the species of the subject of the links using bdb:subjectsSpecies and a species drawn from Appendix B.3.
	###Declare the species of the object of the links using bdb:objectsSpecies and a species drawn from Appendix B.3.
	###`SHOULD` void:subset

	`MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI,

	`MAY` pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime,

	`MAY` pav:createdBy IRI,

	`MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime,

	`MAY` pav:createdWith IRI
}

<Metadata> {
	`MUST` rdf:type (void:DatasetDescription),

	`MUST` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,

	(foaf:primaryTopic @<RDFDatasetDescription>+ | foaf:primaryTopic @<DatasetDescription>+),

	`SHOULD` pav:createdBy IRI,

	`SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,

	`MAY` dcterms:title rdf:langString,

	`MAY` dcterms:description rdf:langString,

	`MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime,

	`MAY` pav:lastUpdateOn xsd:dateTime,

	`MAY` pav:createdWith IRI

}

Basic Inheritance Example

schemas.name: Issue Example
schemas.description: Annotated Issue example from ShEx Demo
schemas.data:
# Issue-simple-annotated.shex - Issue representation in Turtle

#BASE <http://base.example/#>
PREFIX ex: <http://ex.example/#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

start = <IssueShape>  # Issue validation starts with <IssueShape>

<IssueShape> {                           # An <IssueShape> has:
    ex:state (ex:unassigned ex:assigned), # state which is
                                          #   unassigned or assigned.
    ex:reportedBy @<UserShape>,           # reported by a <UserShape>.
    ex:reportedOn xsd:dateTime,           # reported some date/time.
    (                                     # optionally
     ex:reproducedBy @<EmployeeShape>,    #   reproduced by someone
     ex:reproducedOn xsd:dateTime         #   at some data/time.
    )?,
    ex:related @<IssueShape>*             # n related issues.
}

<UserShape> {                           # A <UserShape> has:
    (                                    # either
       foaf:name xsd:string              #   a FOAF name
     |                                   #  or
       foaf:givenName xsd:string+,       #   one or more givenNames
       foaf:familyName xsd:string),      #   and one familyName.
    foaf:mbox IRI               # one FOAF mbox.
}

<EmployeeShape> {                      # An <EmployeeShape> has:
    foaf:givenName xsd:string+,         # at least one givenName.
    foaf:familyName xsd:string,         # one familyName.
    foaf:phone IRI*,           # any number of phone numbers.
    foaf:mbox IRI              # one FOAF mbox.
}
